titleStmt.title: Zeale for Gods house quickned: or, A sermon preached before the assembly of Lords, Commons, and Divines, at their solemn fast Iuly 7. 1643. In the Abbey Church at Westminster. Expressing the eminencie of zeale requisite in church reformers: / by Oliver Bowles, Pator of Sutton in Bedfordshire. Published by order of both Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Bowles, Oliver, ca. 1577-1646?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Bishop for Samuel Gellibrand, at the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon before the assembly of Lords, Commons, and Divines, upon their fast Iuly 7. 1643.
The imprint is in two settings: line 2 of imprint ends (1) "Brazen", or (2) "at the".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
